chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
    <s>On Lent,</s><break time="500ms"/>
    <s>following the Lord's example, we begin fasting with our bodies.</s>
    <s>Let our minds also abstain from sins.</s>
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
In Quadragesima. Exemplo Domini jejunia corporis extra
Incipimus, mentes abstineant vitiis.
